title: Once Upon a More Enlightened Time: More Politically Correct Bedtime Stories
description: This is a "topsy-turvy" book of both Politically Correct Bedtime Stories and Once Upon a More Enlightened Time in one volume, an exclusive Quality Paperback Book Club edition. No publishing date is given, copyright dates of 1994 and 1995 for the two books.
author: James Finn Garner
